entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 9:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
